body_html: @nroth1 could this be a freeze connected to you running out of memory? If you switch from Supervisor to the new MonitoredTrainingSession framework, saving happens in the same Python thread as everything else, so you don't have unlucky parallel .run exploding the memory occasionally
body_text: @nroth1 could this be a freeze connected to you running out of memory? If you switch from Supervisor to the new MonitoredTrainingSession framework, saving happens in the same Python thread as everything else, so you don't have unlucky parallel .run exploding the memory occasionally
body: @nroth1 could this be a freeze connected to you running out of memory? If you switch from `Supervisor` to the new MonitoredTrainingSession framework, saving happens in the same Python thread as everything else, so you don't have unlucky parallel `.run` exploding the memory occasionally
